name: Bonds - Nujuman
description:
After clashing with Unity's President, Rei chooses to work alone to stop the Red Raven. During the journey, he is accompanied by his brother who never turns his back on him, Ren.

On the way, they fight against a dragon that is believed to be controlled by the Red Raven, but who would have thought, the dragon is just bait.

Ren was thrown into the abyss sphere, sending them apart. Plans changed, they have to regroup first...

Trivia:

This story is taken/made by reiennn which is still in the works. this is the part before the climax and way in the middle of the story

Rei and Ren can talk to each other through (let's say) their artificial limbo.

Abyss Sphere: Realm of Undead
